00129 extern nfs_parameter_t nfs_param ;

00145 extern time_t ServerBootTime ;
00146 
00147 #define arg_OPEN4 op->nfs_argop4_u.opopen
00148 #define res_OPEN4 resp->nfs_resop4_u.opopen
00149 
00150 int nfs4_op_open(  struct nfs_argop4 * op ,   
00151                    compound_data_t   * data,
00152                    struct nfs_resop4 * resp)
00153 {
00154     cache_entry_t            * pentry_parent   = NULL ;
00155     cache_entry_t            * pentry_lookup   = NULL ;
00156     cache_entry_t            * pentry_newfile  = NULL ;    
00157     fsal_handle_t            * pnewfsal_handle = NULL ;
00158     fsal_attrib_list_t         attr_parent ;
00159     fsal_attrib_list_t         attr ;
00160     fsal_attrib_list_t         attr_newfile ;
00161     fsal_attrib_list_t         sattr ;
00162     fsal_openflags_t           openflags = 0 ; 
00163     cache_inode_status_t       cache_status ;
00164     nfsstat4                   rc ;    
00165     int                        retval ;
00166     fsal_name_t                filename ;
00167     bool_t                     AttrProvided = FALSE ;
00168     bool_t                     found_state_owner = FALSE ;
00169     fsal_accessmode_t          mode = 0000;
00170     nfs_fh4                    newfh4 ;
00171     nfs_client_id_t            nfs_clientid ;
00172     nfs_worker_data_t        * pworker = NULL ;
00173     int                        convrc = 0 ;
00174     char                       __attribute__(( __unused__ )) funcname[] = "nfs4_op_open" ;
00175     cache_inode_state_data_t   candidate_data ;
00176     cache_inode_state_type_t   candidate_type ;
00177     cache_inode_state_t      * pfile_state = NULL ;
00178     cache_inode_state_t      * pstate_found_iterate = NULL ;
00179     cache_inode_state_t      * pstate_previous_iterate = NULL ;
00180 
00181 
00182 
00183     resp->resop = NFS4_OP_OPEN ;
00184     res_OPEN4.status =  NFS4_OK  ;
00185 
00186     pworker = (nfs_worker_data_t *)data->pclient->pworker ;
00187 
00188     /* If there is no FH */
00189     if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Empty( &(data->currentFH  ) ) )
00190       {
00191         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00192         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00193       }
00194   
00195     /* If the filehandle is invalid */
00196     if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Invalid( &(data->currentFH ) ) )
00197       {
00198         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00199         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00200       }
00201     
00202     /* Tests if the Filehandle is expired (for volatile filehandle) */
00203     if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Expired( &(data->currentFH) ) )
00204       {
00205         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_FHEXPIRED ;
00206         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00207       }
00208 
00209     /* If Filehandle points to a xattr object, manage it via the xattrs specific functions */
00210     if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Xattr( &(data->currentFH ) ) ) 
00211       return nfs4_op_open_xattr( op, data, resp ) ;
00212 
00213     /* If data->current_entry is empty, repopulate it */
00214     if( data->current_entry == NULL )
00215       {
00216         if ( ( data->current_entry = nfs_FhandleToCache( NFS_V4,
00217                                                       NULL,
00218                                                       NULL,
00219                                                       &(data->currentFH),
00220                                                       NULL,
00221                                                       NULL,
00222                                                       &(res_OPEN4.status),
00223                                                       &attr,
00224                                                       data->pcontext,
00225                                                       data->pclient,
00226                                                       data->ht,
00227                                                       &retval ) ) == NULL )
00228                 {
00229                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00230                    return res_OPEN4.status ;
00231                 }
00232       }
00233 
00234     /* Set parent */
00235     pentry_parent = data->current_entry ;
00236  
00237     
00238     /* First switch is based upon claim type */
00239     switch(  arg_OPEN4.claim.claim )
00240      {
00241         case CLAIM_DELEGATE_CUR:
00242         case CLAIM_DELEGATE_PREV:
00243             /* Check for name length */
00244             if( arg_OPEN4.claim.open_claim4_u.file.utf8string_len > FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN )
00245              {
00246                 res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_NAMETOOLONG ;
00247                 return res_OPEN4.status ;
00248              }
00249 
00250            /* get the filename from the argument, it should not be empty */
00251            if( arg_OPEN4.claim.open_claim4_u.file.utf8string_len == 0 )
00252              {
00253                res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00254                return res_OPEN4.status ;
00255              }
00256 
00257             res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_NOTSUPP ;
00258             return res_OPEN4.status ;
00259             break ;
00260  
00261         case CLAIM_NULL:
00262             /* Check for name length */
00263             if( arg_OPEN4.claim.open_claim4_u.file.utf8string_len > FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN )
00264              {
00265                 res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_NAMETOOLONG ;
00266                 return res_OPEN4.status ;
00267              }
00268 
00269            /* get the filename from the argument, it should not be empty */
00270            if( arg_OPEN4.claim.open_claim4_u.file.utf8string_len == 0 )
00271              {
00272                res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00273                return res_OPEN4.status ;
00274              }
00275 
00276            /* Check if asked attributes are correct */ 
00277            if(  arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == GUARDED4   ||
00278                 arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == UNCHECKED4  )
00279             {
00280               if( !nfs4_Fattr_Supported( &arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createattrs ) )
00281                 {
00282                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP ;
00283                    return res_OPEN4.status ;
00284                 }
00285 
00286                 /* Do not use READ attr, use WRITE attr */
00287                if( !nfs4_Fattr_Check_Access( &arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createattrs, FATTR4_ATTR_WRITE ) )
00288                  {
00289                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00290                    return res_OPEN4.status ;
00291                  }
00292             }
00293 
00294             /* Check if filename is correct */
00295             if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_error_convert( FSAL_buffdesc2name( (fsal_buffdesc_t *)&arg_OPEN4.claim.open_claim4_u.file, 
00296                                                                           &filename ) ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00297               {
00298                 res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00299                 return res_OPEN4.status ;
00300               }
00301 
00302             /* Check parent */
00303             pentry_parent = data->current_entry ;
00304 
00305             /* Parent must be a directory */
00306             if( ( pentry_parent->internal_md.type != DIR_BEGINNING ) &&  
00307                 ( pentry_parent->internal_md.type != DIR_CONTINUE )  )
00308               {
00309                 /* Parent object is not a directory... */
00310                 if(  pentry_parent->internal_md.type == SYMBOLIC_LINK )
00311                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SYMLINK ;
00312                 else
00313                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_NOTDIR ;
00314 
00315                return res_OPEN4.status  ;
00316              }
00317 
00318            /* What kind of open is it ? */
00319 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_V4
00320         printf( "     OPEN: Claim type = %d   Open Type = %d  Share Deny = %d   Share Access = %d \n" ,
00321                 arg_OPEN4.claim.claim, arg_OPEN4.openhow.opentype, arg_OPEN4.share_deny, arg_OPEN4.share_access ) ;
00322 #endif
00323 
00324           /* It this a known client id ? */
00325 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_V4
00326           DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "OPEN Client id = %llx", arg_OPEN4.owner.clientid ) ;
00327 #endif
00328           if( nfs_client_id_get( arg_OPEN4.owner.clientid, &nfs_clientid ) != CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS )
00329             {
00330               res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_STALE_CLIENTID ;
00331               return res_OPEN4.status ;
00332             }
00333 
00334           /* The client id should be confirmed */
00335           if( nfs_clientid.confirmed != CONFIRMED_CLIENT_ID )
00336             {
00337               res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_STALE_CLIENTID ;
00338               return res_OPEN4.status ;
00339             }
00340 
00341           /* Status of parent directory before the operation */
00342           if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( pentry_parent, 
00343                                                     &attr_parent,
00344                                                     data->ht, 
00345                                                     data->pclient, 
00346                                                     data->pcontext, 
00347                                                     &cache_status ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00348             {
00349               res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00350               return res_OPEN4.status ;
00351             }
00352           memset( &(res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before), 0, sizeof( changeid4) ) ;
00353           res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before = (changeid4)pentry_parent->internal_md.mod_time ;
00354 
00355           /* Second switch is based upon "openhow" */
00356           switch( arg_OPEN4.openhow.opentype )
00357             {
00358                 case OPEN4_CREATE:
00359                    /* a new file is to be created */ 
00360 
00361                    /* Does a file with this name already exist ? */
00362                    pentry_lookup = cache_inode_lookup( pentry_parent,
00363                                                        &filename, 
00364                                                        &attr_newfile, 
00365                                                        data->ht, 
00366                                                        data->pclient, 
00367                                                        data->pcontext, 
00368                                                        &cache_status ) ;
00369         
00370                    if( cache_status != CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND )
00371                      {
00372                        /* if open is UNCHECKED, return NFS4_OK (RFC3530 page 172) */
00373                        if( arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == UNCHECKED4 && ( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ) )
00374                          {
00375                               /* If the file is opened for write, OPEN4 while deny share write access,
00376                                * in this case, check caller has write access to the file */
00377                              if(  arg_OPEN4.share_deny  & OPEN4_SHARE_DENY_WRITE )
00378                                {
00379                                    if( cache_inode_access( pentry_lookup,
00380                                                            FSAL_W_OK,
00381                                                            data->ht,
00382                                                            data->pclient,
00383                                                            data->pcontext,
00384                                                            &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00385                                        {
00386                                              res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00387                                              return res_OPEN4.status ;
00388                                        }
00389                                     openflags = FSAL_O_WRONLY ;
00390                                }
00391 
00392                              /* Same check on read: check for readability of a file before opening it for read */
00393                              if(  arg_OPEN4.share_access  & OPEN4_SHARE_ACCESS_READ )
00394                                {
00395                                    if( cache_inode_access( pentry_lookup,
00396                                                            FSAL_R_OK,
00397                                                            data->ht,
00398                                                            data->pclient,
00399                                                            data->pcontext,
00400                                                            &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00401                                        {
00402                                              res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00403                                              return res_OPEN4.status ;
00404                                        }
00405                                     openflags = FSAL_O_RDONLY ;
00406                                }
00407 
00408                             /* Same check on write */
00409                             if( arg_OPEN4.share_access & OPEN4_SHARE_ACCESS_WRITE )
00410                                {
00411                                    if( cache_inode_access( pentry_lookup,
00412                                                            FSAL_W_OK,
00413                                                            data->ht,
00414                                                            data->pclient,
00415                                                            data->pcontext,
00416                                                            &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00417                                        {
00418                                              res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00419                                              return res_OPEN4.status ;
00420                                        }
00421                                     openflags = FSAL_O_RDWR ;
00422                                }
00423 
00424                             /* Set the state for the related file */
00425 
00426                             /* Prepare state management structure */
00427                             candidate_type = CACHE_INODE_STATE_SHARE ;
00428                             candidate_data.share.share_deny   = arg_OPEN4.share_deny ;
00429                             candidate_data.share.share_access = arg_OPEN4.share_access ;
00430                             candidate_data.share.confirmed    = FALSE ;
00431 
00432                             if( cache_inode_add_state( pentry_lookup, 
00433                                                        candidate_type,
00434                                                        &candidate_data, 
00435                                                        0, /* Unconfirmed open have a seqid of 0 */
00436                                                        &arg_OPEN4.owner,
00437                                                        data->pclient,             
00438                                                        data->pcontext,
00439                                                        &pfile_state,
00440                                                        &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00441                                 {
00442                                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SHARE_DENIED ;
00443                                    return res_OPEN4.status ;
00444                                 }
00445 
00446                             /* Open the file */
00447                             if( cache_inode_open_by_name( pentry_parent, 
00448                                                           &filename, 
00449                                                           pentry_lookup,   
00450                                                           data->pclient,
00451                                                           openflags,
00452                                                           data->pcontext,
00453                                                           &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00454                               {
00455                                   res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00456                                   return res_OPEN4.status ;
00457                               }
00458  
00459                             res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_len = 0 ; /* No attributes set */
00460     
00461                             memset( &(res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after), 0, sizeof( changeid4 ) ) ;
00462                             res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after  = (changeid4)pentry_parent->internal_md.mod_time ;
00463                             res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.atomic = TRUE ;
00464     
00465 
00466                            res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid.seqid = pfile_state->seqid ;
00467                            memcpy( res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid.other, pfile_state->stateid_other, 12 ) ;
00468 
00469                            /* No delegation */
00470                           res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.delegation.delegation_type = OPEN_DELEGATE_NONE ;
00471 
00472                           /* If server use OPEN_CONFIRM4, set the correct flag */
00473                           if( nfs_param.nfsv4_param.use_open_confirm == TRUE )
00474                               res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.rflags = OPEN4_RESULT_CONFIRM ;
00475                           else
00476                               res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.rflags = 0 ;
00477 
00478 #ifdef _DEBUG_STATES
00479                            nfs_State_PrintAll(  ) ;
00480 #endif
00481 
00482                            res_OPEN4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00483                            return res_OPEN4.status ;
00484                          }
00485 
00486                        /* if open is EXCLUSIVE, but verifier is the same, return NFS4_OK (RFC3530 page 173) */
00487                        if( arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == EXCLUSIVE4 )
00488                          {
00489 #ifdef BUGAZOMEU
00490                             if( pentry_lookup != NULL )
00491                              if( ( pentry_lookup->internal_md.type == REGULAR_FILE ) && ( pentry_lookup->object.file.pshare != NULL ) )
00492                               if( !strncmp( pentry_lookup->object.file.pshare->data.share.oexcl_verifier, 
00493                                             arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createverf, NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE ) )
00494                                 {  
00495                                    /* This is a duplicated ESCLUSIVE4 call, verifier matches, return NFS4_OK */
00496                                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00497                                    return res_OPEN4.status ;
00498                                 }
00499 #else
00500                         printf( "I went through unimplemented case where  arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == EXCLUSIVE4 \n" ) ;
00501 #endif
00502                          }
00503 
00504                        /* Managing GUARDED4 mode */
00505                        if( cache_status != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00506                          res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00507                        else 
00508                          res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ; /* File already exists */
00509                        return res_OPEN4.status ;
00510                      }
00511 
00512 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_V4
00513                    printf( "    OPEN open.how = %d\n", arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode ) ;
00514 #endif
00515         
00516                    /* CLient may have provided fattr4 to set attributes at creation time */
00517                    if( arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == GUARDED4 || 
00518                        arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == UNCHECKED4 )
00519                      {
00520                        if( arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createattrs.attrmask.bitmap4_len != 0 )
00521                          {
00522                            /* Convert fattr4 so nfs4_sattr */
00523                            convrc = nfs4_Fattr_To_FSAL_attr( &sattr, &(arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createattrs ) ) ;
00524 
00525                            if( convrc == 0 )
00526                              {
00527                                res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP  ;
00528                                return res_OPEN4.status ;
00529                              }
00530 
00531                            if( convrc == -1 )
00532                              {
00533                                res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_BADXDR ;
00534                                return res_OPEN4.status ;
00535                              }
00536 
00537                             
00538                            AttrProvided = TRUE ;
00539                          }
00540             
00541                      }
00542         
00543                    /* Create the file, if we reach this point, it does not exist, we can create it */
00544                    if( ( pentry_newfile = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent, 
00545                                                               &filename, 
00546                                                               REGULAR_FILE, 
00547                                                               mode, 
00548                                                               NULL,
00549                                                               &attr_newfile, 
00550                                                               data->ht,
00551                                                               data->pclient, 
00552                                                               data->pcontext, 
00553                                                               &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00554                      {
00555                        /* If the file already exists, this is not an error if open mode is UNCHECKED */
00556                        if( cache_status !=  CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00557                          {
00558                            res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00559                            return res_OPEN4.status ;
00560                          }
00561                        else
00562                          {
00563                            /* If this point is reached, then the file already exists, cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS and pentry_newfile == NULL 
00564                               This probably means EXCLUSIVE4 mode is used and verifier matches. pentry_newfile is then set to pentry_lookup */
00565                            pentry_newfile = pentry_lookup ;
00566                          }
00567                      }
00568     
00569 
00571                     /* State management to be done here */
00572 
00573 
00574                     /* Prepare state management structure */
00575                     candidate_type = CACHE_INODE_STATE_SHARE ;
00576                     candidate_data.share.share_deny   = arg_OPEN4.share_deny ;
00577                     candidate_data.share.share_access = arg_OPEN4.share_access ;
00578                     candidate_data.share.confirmed    = FALSE ;
00579 
00580                     /* If file is opened under mode EXCLUSIVE4, open verifier should be kept to detect non vicious double open */
00581                     if( arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.mode == EXCLUSIVE4 )
00582                       {
00583                            strncpy( candidate_data.share.oexcl_verifier , 
00584                                     arg_OPEN4.openhow.openflag4_u.how.createhow4_u.createverf, 
00585                                     NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE ) ;
00586                       } 
00587 
00588                     if( cache_inode_add_state( pentry_newfile, 
00589                                                candidate_type,
00590                                                &candidate_data, 
00591                                                0, /* Unconfirmed open have a seqid of 0 */
00592                                                &arg_OPEN4.owner,
00593                                                data->pclient, 
00594                                                data->pcontext,
00595                                                &pfile_state,
00596                                                &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00597                         {
00598                            res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SHARE_DENIED ;
00599                            return res_OPEN4.status ;
00600                         }
00601  
00602                     if( AttrProvided == TRUE ) /* Set the attribute if provided */
00603                       {
00604                         if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_setattr( pentry_newfile, 
00605                                                                   &sattr, 
00606                                                                   data->ht, 
00607                                                                   data->pclient, 
00608                                                                   data->pcontext, 
00609                                                                   &cache_status ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00610                           {
00611                             res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00612                             return  res_OPEN4.status ;
00613                           }
00614             
00615                       }
00616 
00617                    /* Set the openflags variable */
00618                    if( arg_OPEN4.share_deny & OPEN4_SHARE_DENY_WRITE ) openflags |= FSAL_O_RDONLY ;
00619                    if( arg_OPEN4.share_deny & OPEN4_SHARE_DENY_READ )  openflags |= FSAL_O_WRONLY ;
00620                    if( arg_OPEN4.share_access & OPEN4_SHARE_ACCESS_WRITE ) openflags = FSAL_O_RDWR ; 
00621                    if( arg_OPEN4.share_access != 0 ) openflags = FSAL_O_RDWR ; /* @todo : BUGAZOMEU : Something better later */
00622 
00623                    /* Open the file */
00624                    if( cache_inode_open_by_name( pentry_parent,
00625                                                  &filename,
00626                                                  pentry_newfile,
00627                                                  data->pclient,
00628                                                  openflags,
00629                                                  data->pcontext,
00630                                                  &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00631                       {
00632                           res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00633                           return res_OPEN4.status ;
00634                       }
00635 
00636 
00637                    break ;
00638 
00639 
00640                 case OPEN4_NOCREATE:
00641                   /* It was not a creation, but a regular open */
00642                   /* The filehandle to the new file replaces the current filehandle */
00643                   if( pentry_newfile == NULL )
00644                     {
00645                       if( ( pentry_newfile = cache_inode_lookup( pentry_parent,
00646                                                                  &filename, 
00647                                                                  &attr_newfile, 
00648                                                                  data->ht, 
00649                                                                  data->pclient, 
00650                                                                  data->pcontext, 
00651                                                                  &cache_status) ) == NULL )
00652                        {
00653                          res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00654                          return res_OPEN4.status ;
00655                        }
00656                     }
00657 
00658                   /* OPEN4 is to be done on a file */
00659                   if( pentry_newfile->internal_md.type != REGULAR_FILE ) 
00660                     {
00661                       if( pentry_newfile->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING || pentry_newfile->internal_md.type == DIR_CONTINUE )
00662                         {
00663                           res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ISDIR ;
00664                           return res_OPEN4.status ;
00665                         }
00666                       else if(  pentry_newfile->internal_md.type == SYMBOLIC_LINK )
00667                         {
00668                           res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SYMLINK ;
00669                           return res_OPEN4.status ;
00670                         }
00671                       else
00672                         {
00673                           res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00674                           return res_OPEN4.status ;
00675                         }
00676                     }           
00677 
00678 
00679                   /* If the file is opened for write, OPEN4 while deny share write access,
00680                    * in this case, check caller has write access to the file */
00681                   if(  arg_OPEN4.share_deny  & OPEN4_SHARE_DENY_WRITE )
00682                     {
00683                         if( cache_inode_access( pentry_newfile,
00684                                                 FSAL_W_OK,
00685                                                 data->ht,
00686                                                 data->pclient,
00687                                                 data->pcontext,
00688                                                 &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00689                             {
00690                                   res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00691                                   return res_OPEN4.status ;
00692                             }
00693                          openflags = FSAL_O_WRONLY ;
00694                     }
00695 
00696                   /* Same check on read: check for readability of a file before opening it for read */
00697                   if(  arg_OPEN4.share_access  & OPEN4_SHARE_ACCESS_READ )
00698                     {
00699                         if( cache_inode_access( pentry_newfile,
00700                                                 FSAL_R_OK,
00701                                                 data->ht,
00702                                                 data->pclient,
00703                                                 data->pcontext,
00704                                                 &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00705                             {
00706                                   res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00707                                   return res_OPEN4.status ;
00708                             }
00709                          openflags = FSAL_O_RDONLY ;
00710                     }
00711 
00712                  /* Same check on write */
00713                  if( arg_OPEN4.share_access & OPEN4_SHARE_ACCESS_WRITE )
00714                    {
00715                         if( cache_inode_access( pentry_newfile,
00716                                                 FSAL_W_OK,
00717                                                 data->ht,
00718                                                 data->pclient,
00719                                                 data->pcontext,
00720                                                 &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00721                             {
00722                                   res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00723                                   return res_OPEN4.status ;
00724                             }
00725                          openflags = FSAL_O_RDWR ;
00726                     }
00727 
00728                   /* If file mode is 000 then NFS4ERR_ACCESS should be returned for all cases and users */
00729                   if( attr_newfile.mode == 0 ) 
00730                    {
00731                         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00732                         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00733                    }
00734 
00735                   /* Try to find if the same open_owner already has acquired a stateid for this file */
00736                   pstate_found_iterate    = NULL ;
00737                   pstate_previous_iterate = NULL ;
00738                   do
00739                   {
00740                      cache_inode_state_iterate( pentry_newfile,
00741                                                 &pstate_found_iterate,
00742                                                 pstate_previous_iterate,
00743                                                 data->pclient,
00744                                                 data->pcontext, 
00745                                                 &cache_status ) ;
00746                     if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_STATE_ERROR )
00747                      break ; /* Get out of the loop */
00748        
00749                     if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT )
00750                      {
00751                         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00752                         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00753                      }
00754 
00755                     /* Check is open_owner is the same */
00756                     if( pstate_found_iterate != NULL )
00757                      {
00758                        if( pstate_found_iterate->state_owner.clientid == arg_OPEN4.owner.clientid ) 
00759                         {
00760                           if( pstate_found_iterate->state_owner.owner.owner_len == arg_OPEN4.owner.owner.owner_len ) 
00761                            {
00762                               if( !memcmp( arg_OPEN4.owner.owner.owner_val, 
00763                                            pstate_found_iterate->state_owner.owner.owner_val,
00764                                            pstate_found_iterate->state_owner.owner.owner_len ) )
00765                                {
00766                                    /* We'll be re-using the found state */
00767                                    found_state_owner = TRUE ;
00768                                    break ;
00769                                }
00770                            }
00771                         }
00772                      }
00773                     pstate_previous_iterate = pstate_found_iterate ;
00774                   } while( pstate_found_iterate != NULL ) ;
00775 
00776                 if( found_state_owner == TRUE ) 
00777                  {
00778                     pfile_state = pstate_found_iterate ;
00779                     pfile_state->seqid += 1 ; 
00780                  }
00781                 else
00782                  {
00783                    /* Set the state for the related file */
00784                    /* Prepare state management structure */
00785                    candidate_type = CACHE_INODE_STATE_SHARE ;
00786                    candidate_data.share.share_deny   = arg_OPEN4.share_deny ;
00787                    candidate_data.share.share_access = arg_OPEN4.share_access ;
00788                    candidate_data.share.confirmed    = FALSE ;
00789 
00790                    if( cache_inode_add_state( pentry_newfile, 
00791                                               candidate_type,
00792                                               &candidate_data,  
00793                                               /* Use the provided seqid, the same client may have opened the file */
00794                                               arg_OPEN4.seqid,  
00795                                               &arg_OPEN4.owner,
00796                                               data->pclient, 
00797                                               data->pcontext,
00798                                               &pfile_state,
00799                                               &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00800                       {
00801                          res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SHARE_DENIED ;
00802                          return res_OPEN4.status ;
00803                       }
00804                   }
00805                  /* Open the file */
00806                  if( cache_inode_open_by_name( pentry_parent, 
00807                                                &filename, 
00808                                                pentry_newfile,   
00809                                                data->pclient,
00810                                                openflags,
00811                                                data->pcontext,
00812                                                &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00813                    {
00814                        res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_ACCESS ;
00815                        return res_OPEN4.status ;
00816                    }
00817                  break ; 
00818              
00819                 default:
00820                    res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00821                    return res_OPEN4.status ;
00822                    break ;
00823             } /* switch( arg_OPEN4.openhow.opentype ) */
00824 
00825           break ; 
00826 
00827         case CLAIM_PREVIOUS:
00828           break ;
00829 
00830         default:
00831           res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00832           return res_OPEN4.status ;
00833           break ;
00834      } /*  switch(  arg_OPEN4.claim.claim ) */
00835 
00836 
00837     /* Now produce the filehandle to this file */
00838     if( ( pnewfsal_handle = cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( pentry_newfile, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00839       {
00840         res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00841         return  res_OPEN4.status ;
00842       }
00843 
00844     /* Allocation of a new file handle */
00845     if( ( rc = nfs4_AllocateFH( &newfh4 ) ) != NFS4_OK )
00846       {
00847         res_OPEN4.status = rc ;
00848         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00849       }
00850   
00851     /* Building a new fh */
00852     if( !nfs4_FSALToFhandle( &newfh4, pnewfsal_handle, data ) )
00853       {
00854         res_OPEN4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00855         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00856       }
00857     
00858     /* This new fh replaces the current FH */
00859     data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_len = newfh4.nfs_fh4_len ;
00860     memcpy( data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_val, newfh4.nfs_fh4_val, newfh4.nfs_fh4_len ) ;
00861     
00862     data->current_entry = pentry_newfile ;
00863     data->current_filetype = REGULAR_FILE ;
00864    
00865  
00866     /* No do not need newfh any more */
00867     Mem_Free( (char *)newfh4.nfs_fh4_val ) ;
00868   
00869     /* Status of parent directory after the operation */
00870     if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( pentry_parent, 
00871                                               &attr_parent, 
00872                                               data->ht, 
00873                                               data->pclient, 
00874                                               data->pcontext, 
00875                                               &cache_status ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00876       {
00877         res_OPEN4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00878         return res_OPEN4.status ;
00879       }
00880     
00881     res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_len = 0 ; /* No attributes set */
00882     
00883     memset( &(res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after), 0, sizeof( changeid4 ) ) ;
00884     res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after  = (changeid4)pentry_parent->internal_md.mod_time ;
00885     res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.cinfo.atomic = TRUE ;
00886     
00887 
00888     res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid.seqid = pfile_state->seqid ;
00889     memcpy( res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.stateid.other, pfile_state->stateid_other, 12 ) ;
00890 
00891     /* No delegation */
00892     res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.delegation.delegation_type = OPEN_DELEGATE_NONE ;
00893 
00894     /* If server use OPEN_CONFIRM4, set the correct flag */
00895     if( nfs_param.nfsv4_param.use_open_confirm == TRUE )
00896         res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.rflags = OPEN4_RESULT_CONFIRM ;
00897     else
00898         res_OPEN4.OPEN4res_u.resok4.rflags = 0 ;
00899    
00900 #ifdef _DEBUG_STATES
00901     nfs_State_PrintAll(  ) ;
00902 #endif 
00903 
00904     /* regular exit */
00905     res_OPEN4.status = NFS4_OK ; 
00906     return res_OPEN4.status;
00907  
00908 } /* nfs4_op_open */
00909 
00910     
00921 void nfs4_op_open_Free( OPEN4res * resp )
00922 {
00923   /* Nothing to be done */
00924   return ;
00925 } /* nfs4_op_open_Free */
